comment.author: 43607120@N00
comment._content: I agree, the mountains look either Oman or Yemen... I'm unaware of such buildings on Oman so I'm assuming its Yemen.

comment.author: 23884495@N05
comment._content: the buildings definitely look like yemen. I was there last year, and i saw buildings similar to this design.

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content:
Hi Everyone,

Thanks for your comments and helping us to identify that this isn't Kuwait. We'll hopefully be able to identify the true location with your help.

Many thanks

Lucinda

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content: We have identified 2 possible locations for this image according to Alan Villiers' voyages. It could be either Mutrah or Mukallah - does anyone know these areas?

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content:
Hi All,

The mystery has been solved. We believe this image is of Mukallah.

comment.author: 36051812@N06
comment._content: It says it all; "Sailing into Mukallah" - the image is from Yemen. Mukallah is one of the main cities in Yemen. Kuwaiti coast is not built like this. All the structures are new in design much of them built post Iraq invasion of Kuwait in 1990.
